text:
Brydie Pye (born 14 October 1993) is a New Zealand water polo player. She competed for the New Zealand women's national water polo team in the 2017 World Aquatics Championships.
She is a native of Lower Hutt, New Zealand. She was educated at Sacred Heart College, Lower Hutt. She played for the University of the Pacific's women's water polo team.

annotations.surface_form: New Zealand women's national water polo team
